issue.title: C++: Add Equals implementation to compare Tables
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-415](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-415). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The `arrow::Table` class is missing a method to compare it to other `arrow::Table` instances. There should be one implemented in the way the `Equals` implementation is done in the subclasses of `arrow::Array`.
